name: Weed Boss 2 - Run A Ganja Pot Firm And Become The Farm Tycoon Clicker Version
name_original: Weed Boss 2 - Run A Ganja Pot Firm And Become The Farm Tycoon Clicker Version
description:
***** Featured as a top 100 strategy game in more than 40 countries worldwide *****

Selling weed isn't difficult, but dealing successfully is.
"Weed Boss 2 - Run A Ganja Firm And Become The Farm Tycoon Clicker Version" is a weed dealing game where you start from growing weed in your basement weed firm to making billions. You face all problems that a successful dealer goes through.

How to play the game - Keep clicking, clicking and clicking until you have enough weed to multiply then grow and keep multiplying. Your goal is to become a Weed Boss 2!

****How to play?****

Instructions on how to play the game can be found under "Settings" in the game.

Features:
- Buying different labs to grow different weed strains
- Recruiting gangs around the world to help distribution
- Growing reputation to deal in bulks
- From making $10's to thousands to millions to billions to KB's to MB's to BB's to kBB's. even MBB or BBB.
- 12 hour offline production
- Tutorials


Act quick and become the next famous Weed Boss 2! .... be the first to click 1 BILLION Weed!

New Updates and fixes coming soon, stay tuned!

Follow us on Facebook for updates / suggestions / feedback! -
https://www.facebook.com/theholycowstudio
